summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Shopping web app. Backend APIs are 96% functional with one minor issue fixed. Frontend loads properly but has navigation and component issues that need attention.

fixed_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 500 status
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added ObjectId removal in orders endpoint

ui_bugs.issue: React component error - SelectItem must have a value prop that is not an empty string
ui_bugs.impact: Console errors and potential component instability

ui_bugs.issue: Browse Products button navigation fails - timeout waiting for products page
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot navigate to products page via button click

ui_bugs.issue: Floating AI assistant button not clickable due to overlay interference
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot access AI assistant via floating button

integration_issues.issue: Direct URL navigation works but button navigation fails
affected_pages: Products page via Browse Products button

positive_aspects: Beautiful gradient hero section with proper branding

passed_tests: Product endpoints with filters and search (100%)
AI query functionality with semantic search (100%)
Homepage loading and hero section display (100%)
Direct URL navigation to all pages (100%)

high_priority: Fix SelectItem component error - ensure all SelectItem components have proper value props
Fix Browse Products button navigation - investigate routing issue preventing navigation to products page
Fix AI Assistant floating button clickability - resolve overlay interference issue
medium_priority: Add error boundaries to React components to handle component errors gracefully
Test and verify products page loads correctly after navigation fix
action_item_for_main_agent.testing_notes: Backend is fully functional with 96% success rate. Frontend UI looks great but has critical navigation issues that prevent full user flow testing.
